title: Riven
body:
* Aoe stun
* Aoe Knockup
* ranged AOE execute w/ super high base stats
* Hyper Base AD
* doesn't require Mana/Stamina
* Has Shield Based off AD, very low CD
* Dash
* Can jump over walls
* can outrade any champion at lvl 1 without using auto attacks
* Low CD AD Steroid (ult)
* hyper Mobility

For a champion that is "High Skillcap" a 54% winrate seems a bit silly to me.
